data.eml:eml: Lectotype designation and distribution updates on the freshwater shrimp species Atyaephyra stankoi Karaman 1972

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Christodoulou, Magdalini, Kihara, Terue Cristina (2018): Lectotype designation and distribution updates on the freshwater shrimp species Atyaephyra stankoi Karaman 1972. Zootaxa 4531 (1): 123-133, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.1.7
